channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #54 – Making Objects Float in Corona SDK

item.title: By: Dave Baxter
item.dc:creator: Dave Baxter
item.description:
Any chance these can be turned into written tutorials ?
Much easier to follow and understand. Video of the finished thing is fine but video tutorials don't seem very popular on here.
Dave
